title: T206 Engle SGC40 for sale or trade
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: T206 Engle SGC40 for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this nicely centered Engle for sale or trade. $40.00 delivered. Paypal gift, check or money order please. I will also trade for a SGC graded T206 of similar value that I don't have. My collection is registered on the SGC site under Joe's T206 collection. SOLD

Thanks for looking,

Joe
